title: Kariyer.net Jobs Scraper
description: Scrape job listings from Kariyer.net. Provide either keyword/location OR a Kariyer.net search URL (startUrl, url, or startUrls). Actor paginates and optionally scrapes detail pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Kariyer.net search URL. If provided, this will be used instead of Keyword/Location.

keyword.title: Keyword (if not using Start URL)
keyword.description: Job search keyword(s), e.g., 'Yazılım Mühendisi', 'Pazarlama Müdürü', 'Veri Analisti'.

location.title: Location (if not using Start URL)
location.description: Location filter, e.g., 'İstanbul', 'Ankara', 'İzmir'. Leave empty for all locations.

max_job_age.title: Maximum job age
max_job_age.description: Only collect jobs posted within this time frame. Helps focus on recent listings.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens job detail pages for full description and additional info.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of jobs to collect. Leave empty to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy (residential recommended for Kariyer.net).

cookies.title: Custom cookies (raw header)
cookies.description: Optional raw 'Cookie' header string. Can help bypass consent banners.

cookiesJson.title: Custom cookies (JSON)
cookiesJson.description: Optional JSON-formatted cookies. Accepts an array (e.g., [{"name":"a","value":"1"}]) or an object map (e.g., {"a":"1"}).

dedupe.title: Deduplicate results
dedupe.description: Remove duplicate job URLs from results (in-memory deduplication).
